sentence: That story has repeated itself again as House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.) told reporters on Wednesday that he may take further action to condemn Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), who conceded that he exaggerated? in saying recently that GOP members invited him to orgies and that he saw them doing cocaine regularly (The Hill).
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hill's Morning Report  Some brighter news for Biden?

sentence: Return to menu North Carolina state Sen. Chuck Edwards, who's mounting a GOP primary challenge to embattled Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), has a new ad out in which he compares Cawthorn's celebrity status to that of the Kardashians.
title: Post Politics Now With Romney and Murkowski's pledged votes, Jackson has clear path to confirmation
